Detector.Details: Original detector to detect MY_BUG bug pattern.

BugPattern.LongDescription: AWS Lambda functions that use SnapStart feature should not initialize Lambda handler class members with pseudo random generators. As SnapStart functions are snapshotted once after handler class initialization is done, class members with pseudo-random values won't be pseudo-random anymore.
BugPattern.Details: Explain existing problem in code, and how developer should improve their implementation.
